remarks.format: ## Remarks `documentSequencePT` 或是`documentPT`可以是`null`如果沒有任何慣用的列印設定。`documentSequencePT` or `documentPT` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings. 這個方法不會驗證或修改特定指定列印票證。This method does not validate or modify the given print tickets for a particular . 如果需要使用方法用來建立-特定這是適用於指定的印表機。If needed, use the method to create a -specific that is valid for a given printer. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用方法。The following example shows the use of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks `printTicket` 可以是`null`如果沒有任何慣用的列印設定。`printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings. 這個方法不會驗證或修改給定`printTicket`特定。This method does not validate or modify the given `printTicket` for a particular . 如果需要使用方法用來建立-特定這是適用於指定的印表機。If needed, use the method to create a -specific that is valid for a given printer. `userState` 傳遞給當就會發生事件。`userState` is passed to the when the event occurs. 輸出的寫入作業通常指定做為實作的衍生類別的建構函式的參數。The output of the write operation is normally specified as a parameter to the constructor of the derived class that implements .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void WriteAsync (System.Windows.Media.Visual visual, System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket, object userState);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteAsync(class System.Windows.Media.Visual visual, class System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket, object userState) cil managed
public: abstract void WriteAsync(System::Windows::Media::Visual ^ visual, System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ printTicket, System::Object ^ userState);
abstract member WriteAsync : System.Windows.Media.Visual * System.Printing.PrintTicket * obj -> unit

param.name: visual
param.span: 要寫入序列化 的 項目。

span.span: The element to write to the serialization .

param.name: printTicket
param.span: 項目的預設列印喜好設定。

span.span: The default print preferences for the element.

param.name: userState
param.span: 識別非同步寫入作業的呼叫端指定物件。

span.span: A caller-specified object to identify the asynchronous write operation.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，以非同步方式將指定的 元素連同相關聯的 和識別碼一起寫入至序列化 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously writes a given element together with an associated and identifier to the serialization .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `printTicket` 可以是`null`如果沒有任何慣用的列印設定。`printTicket` can be `null` if there are no preferred print settings. 這個方法不會驗證或修改給定`printTicket`特定。This method does not validate or modify the given `printTicket` for a particular . 如果需要使用方法用來建立-特定這是適用於指定的印表機。If needed, use the method to create a -specific that is valid for a given printer. `userState` 傳遞給當就會發生事件。`userState` is passed to the when the event occurs. 輸出的寫入作業通常指定做為實作的衍生類別的建構函式的參數。The output of the write operation is normally specified as a parameter to the constructor of the derived class that implements .

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, occurs just before a is added to a stream by a or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓以新的事件處理常式中所指定的或方法呼叫。The event enables the event handler to substitute a new for the one specified in the or method call.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，就會發生時更新進度。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, occurs when the updates its progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比方說，每一頁或多重文件中的每個文件寫入作業之後，可以更新其進度。For example, the could update its progress after every page or after every document in a multi-document write operation.
